H0.text: Decrease is the most likely outcome for the number of plants and animals living in the area where a large amount of oil was spilled in a lake environment within a few weeks.

H1.text: Increase is the most likely effect on the number of plants and animals living in the area where a large amount of oil was spilled in a lake environment within a few weeks.

H2.text: The number of plants and animals in the area where a large amount of oil was spilled in a lake environment will most likely remain the same within a few weeks.

A3.text: The majority of birds affected by oil spills die from complications without human intervention.
